Package bg.reachup.edu.checkers.state

Class Board

java.lang.Object
bg.reachup.edu.checkers.state.Board
public class Board extends Object
Class representing the game board.

  • Method Details

    • parseFromFile

      public static Board parseFromFile(String filePath)
      Parses the file at the specified path into a new Board instance based on its contents
      Parameters:
      filePath - location of the file to be parsed
      Returns:
      Board instance based on the contents of the file at the specified path
      Throws:
      IllegalPiecePlacementException - if there is a piece at an illegal spot
      BoardFileAccessException - if the file at the specified path could not be accessed
      InvalidPieceStringException - if an invalid symbol was found while parsing the map

    • parseFromString

      public static Board parseFromString(String board)
      Parses the specified string representation of a board into a new Board instance based on its contents
      Parameters:
      board - string representation of the board to be parsed
      Returns:
      Board instance based on the specified string board representation
      Throws:
      IllegalPiecePlacementException - if there is a piece at an illegal spot
      InvalidPieceStringException - if an invalid symbol was found while parsing the board

    • getPieces

      public void getPieces(List<Piece> whitePieces, List<Piece> blackPieces)
      Fills the specified lists with references to all the corresponding pieces on the board
      Parameters:
      whitePieces - list for the white pieces
      blackPieces - list for the black pieces

    • getAt

      public Piece getAt(Coordinates coordinates)
      Returns the Piece object at the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the piece to be returned
      Returns:
      The piece at the specified coordinates
      Throws:
      CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are outside the bounds of the board

    • removeAt

      public Piece removeAt(Coordinates coordinates)
      Removes the Piece object at the specified coordinates and returns it
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates of the piece to be removed
      Returns:
      The piece that was removed
      Throws:
      CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are outside the bounds of the board

    • movePiece

      public Board movePiece(Coordinates piecePosition, Coordinates destination)
      Moves the piece at the specified coordinates to the destination coordinates
      Parameters:
      piecePosition - the coordinates of the piece to be moved
      destination - the destination of the piece
      Returns:
      A deep copy of the board with the piece repositioned
      Throws:
      CoordinatesOutOfBoundsException - if either the piece's or the destination's coordinates are outside the bounds of the board

    • isWithin

      public boolean isWithin(Coordinates coordinates)
      Returns true if the specified coordinates are within the bounds of the board
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the coordinates are within the board

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree(Coordinates coordinates)
      Returns true if there is no piece at the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates to be checked
      Returns:
      true if there is no piece at the specified coordinates

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this board. The string representation consists of all the pieces on the board, seperated by vertical bars ("|"). Elements are converted to strings as by Piece.toString(). The null elements are represented as empty spaces (" ").
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of this board
